## `StitchImagesVertically`

Combines a list of images vertically. Returns true if image successfully saved.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
boolean StitchImagesVertically(string outputImagePath,
                               string inputImages)
```


### Return value {-}

Type: `boolean`

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
|`string` outputImagePath | Where to save the combined images. | 
|`string` inputImage1 | The first image to merge. |
|... | Any additional images to merge with `inputImage1`. |
